original_title: アリア ジ オーブイエー ~アリエッタ~
overview: Akari finds herself nervous coaching a new undine as a Prima, until she awakens to find that it is just a dream. To soothe her worries, Alicia recalls stories of her beginnings as a Prima, as well as the memories she made.
tagline: The story of Aria company before the arrival of Akari.
title: Aria the OVA: Arietta
